diagrams.description: A detailed flowchart of the Total Quality Management (TQM) framework.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    A[Total Quality Management] --> B[Customer Focus]
    A --> C[Leadership]
    A --> D[Employee Involvement]
    A --> E[Process Approach]
    A --> F[System Approach to Management]
    A --> G[Continual Improvement]
    A --> H[Factual Approach to Decision Making]
    A --> I[Mutually Beneficial Supplier Relationships]
